products.name: iPhone 11 Pro Max
products.waterResistant: Water and dust resistant (4 metres for up to 30 minutes, IP68)
products.camera: Triple-camera system with 12MP Ultra Wide, Wide, and Telephoto cameras; Night mode, Portrait mode, and 4K video up to 60fps
products.frontCamera: 12MP TrueDepth front camera with Portrait mode, 4K video, and Slo-Mo
products.futures: Face ID for secure authentication and Apple Pay
products.processor: A13 Bionic chip with third-generation Neural Engine
